comments: Except for the first term, A100672(n) = (A039702(n)-1)/2 = parity of A005097. - _Jeremy Gardiner_, May 17 2008
links: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a039702 = (`mod` 4) . a000040  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 20 2012(PARI) a(n)=prime(n)%4 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jun 13 2013(MAGMA) [p mod 4: p in PrimesUpTo(500)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 06 2014
